Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver.marketturntoserver

Class NewDepositStateToServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver.EventToServer
it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver.marketturntoserver.NewDepositStateToServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NewDepositStateToServer
extends EventToServer
This class represents the event to sent to the server with the information of the new deposit state after that the player menages them.
Author:
Stefano Fossati
See Also:
Serialized Form

    void acceptServerVisitor​(EventToServerVisitor visitor)

    • NewDepositStateToServer

      public NewDepositStateToServer​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> newDepositState, int discardResources, java.lang.String playerName, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDepositState)
      Constructs the event.
      Parameters:
      newDepositState - The new deposit state choose by the player.
      discardResources - The resources from the market that the player has discarded.
      playerName - The name of the player that sends the event.
      isAdditional - Is true if the player has some active additional deposit, else is false.
      additionalDepositState - The new state of the active additional deposit of the player.
